to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: With the same as Hollywood, the star is the important insurance ofthe Hong Kong movie booking office.
sentences.chinese: 與好萊圬一樣，明星是香港電影票房的重要保證。

sentences.english: I hope Mr. Bingley will like it, Lizzy.
sentences.chinese: 我希看彬格萊先生會喜歡你這頂帽子，麗萃。

sentences.english: This user lives in the state of North Carolina .
sentences.chinese: 這個用戶現在居住在北卡羅萊那州。

sentences.english: Dr Pax Leonard describes the area as the "cultural centre of Greenland".
sentences.chinese: 萊奧納多博士稱這些地區是格陵蘭的文化中心。

sentences.english: Perez de Tagl also had a non-speaking role in the movie Bee Season .
sentences.chinese: 佩雷斯德奎利亞爾塔格萊也有表演在電影《蜂王季》。

sentences.english: " It wasn't a hard decision, " says Lefcourt.
sentences.chinese: 做這樣的決定並不困難，萊科特說。

sentences.english: However, Pillay believes the plan is illegal.
sentences.chinese: 然而納維皮萊認爲這個計劃是非法的。

sentences.english: He was just starting to become known on the cabaret circuit .
sentences.chinese: 他在卡巴萊歌舞表演圈中剛剛開始有點名氣。

sentences.english: There are new calls for South Carolina's embattled Governor to quit.
sentences.chinese: 又有新的呼聲要求南卡羅萊那州長辭職。

sentences.english: And when the king was come over, the king kissed Barzillai, and blessed him; and he returned unto his own place.
sentences.chinese: 王與巴西萊親嘴，爲他祝福，巴西萊就回本地去了。

sentences.english: And when the king was come over, the king kissed Barzillai, and blessed him; and he returned unto his own place.
sentences.chinese: 王與巴西萊親嘴，爲他祝福，巴西萊就回本地去了。
如果你說“萊託”，我會迴應。

sentences.english: Some people may think this dish is sightly hot for their taste.
sentences.chinese: 有些人會覺得對他們的口味來說，這道萊有點兒辣。

sentences.english: Lesbianism gained its name from the Greek island of Lesbos.
sentences.chinese: 女同性戀者的名稱出自希臘的萊斯博斯島。

sentences.english: I have broken through your defenses, Leto.
sentences.chinese: 我穿透了你的防線，萊託。

sentences.english: I had hoped to come here, but I couldn't.
sentences.chinese: 莪夲萊剘望萊這裏，但莈褦做到。

definition: (bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
